name: INDOOR SHOOT
description:
A SHOOTER GAME BY MG BEATZ , THE IDEA IS TO SURVIVE

USE YOUR MOUSE TO SHOOT AND ROTATE THE TANK AND AIM

TO MAKE IT LITTLE BIT EASIER , YOUR TANK IS ALSO EQUIPPED  WITH TWO ROTATEBLE GUNS THAT ARE CONTROLLED BY AI

ONLY 9 LEVELS THE IDEA IS TO HAVE FUN . .

COLLECT POINTS , THIS IS JUST A JAM VERSION
